## WorkerBasedDecoder.getTileInfo() method

Get \[\[TileInfo\]\] from tile decoder service in worker.

Invokes \[\[TileInfoRequest\]\] on \[\[TileDecoderService\]\] running in worker pool.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTileInfo(data: ArrayBufferLike, tileKey: TileKey, projection: Projection, requestController?: RequestController): Promise<TileInfo | undefined>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  requestController | [RequestController](./harp-datasource-protocol.requestcontroller.md) |  |
